document_title: Hepatitis B: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Illustration of hepatitis B
Hepatitis B (also called hepatitis B) is a liver infection caused by the hepatitis B virus (HBV). If not treated promptly and properly, hepatitis B can cause serious liver damage, leading to many dangerous consequences, even threatening the patient's life.(3)
